short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension extracts job descriptions and optimizes resumes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Resume Optimizer – Craft your perfect resume with ease!
Looking for the perfect job? Make sure your resume stands out with Resume Optimizer! This powerful Chrome extension helps you effortlessly match your resume to any job description in minutes.
Why Resume Optimizer?
•	Save time and effort by avoiding manual edits.
•	Increase your chances of passing through Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
•	Get personalized resume recommendations for each job application.
How it works:
•	Extracts the job description from job posting.
•	Analyses your resume and identifies key areas for improvement.
•	Optimizes your resume by aligning it with the job's requirements, highlighting relevant skills, and using keywords employers are searching for.

Whether you’re applying for your dream job or refining your resume for multiple roles, Resume Optimizer gives you the tools to create an ideal, tailored resume every time.
Perfect for job seekers who want to increase their chances of landing interviews, Resume Optimizer makes the process of customizing your resume quick and easy.
Try Resume Optimizer today to build your best resume for every job you apply to!
